def ensure_ready(remote_control:item, television:item):
    # Ensures the remote control and television are ready for operation
    symbol tv_in_home_office = exists room: item : is_home_office(room) and inside(television, room)
    symbol remote_close = close(remote_control, television) and is_remote_control(remote_control)
    return tv_in_home_office and remote_close

        # Select the remote control with ID 2052
